dc_title_s: Boundary between the United States & Mexico
dc_description_s: 1 map ; 58 x 91 cm|Relief shown by hachures.|"Astronomically determined and surveyed in 1855. under the direction of William H. Emory, U.S. Commissioner."|"Latitude and Longitude by W. H. Emory, assisted by J. H. Clark."|"Trangulation and Topography by M. von Hippel, assisted by J. E. Weyss."|"Engr. by Selmar Siebert."|Prime meridian : Greenwich.|Includes "View along the boundary line-looking E. from monument No. 3" and "View of the initial point of the boundary line on the Rio Bravo Del Norte-looking W" Ino. Weyess del., W. H. Douglas.|"No. 29."
